page.section:
Belgia 1590 8 Octo
b
To my Lord Trea
s
page.lettertext:
May it please yo
r
good L. The fitte
opportunitie of a messenger being offered,
but geving me no leasure, to write at any
length, I send yo
r
L. heerew
t
Count Mau-
rice
owne letter to
e
Councell of state
, de-
claring the surrendrie of
e towne of
Steen-
berghen
: whiche geveth a great con tentm
t
to
e people of this contrey. For
e passage
by water between
Holland
and
Zeland
will nowe in a maner be cleane out of dan-
ger, and
e contrey eased of a great expense
in maintening many shippes of warre, for
the only securitie of those
at passed that
way &c./. Oc
t
8. 90
